column5: LOL  I am my own worse enemy,  but ,   RESPECT  Come on  LOL  Hope you like the new camera angle OIM ?
Nice fish 	glad you didn't show when i pulled up beside you in my ex-boat  to catch fish cause you're famous 	Or is that infamous  lol
You texted me, and told me you were coming for lunch. LOL

Hey Brian, don't let that stuff bug you. Just keep on fishing man. Screw em all. Some people are just plain ignorant (more than ever). It used to really bother me, I'd get heated, but its just not worth it.  Enjoy your day, ignore the idiots, and carry on. You know how to have fun. Who has time for that crap anyways. P.S...I watch all your vids, and laugh every time. Keep em coming.  S.
lol great reply...you should lnow youve been following me around all morning ahhahaha  at least you got one right after they left. Solid fish
LoL. You've got like a 3" draft on that thing. You need to find some shoals & reefs that they can't follow you through.
They frigged off and you bagged a nice one...I'd call that a success
I have found that wearing a clown nose is a great way to go unnoticed. Art
I heard that I should look for the yak if I fish the bay and want to catch fish...lol. It drives me crazy too and I have been working on letting that stuff go.

You had better check for a GPS devise they use in the movies to track your location Brian. And don't pick on the Russians, anyone knows they are speaking Croatian for God sakes. As far as came angles, 2" lower and that would be too close and personal. Who was on the camera before you got to the water? Stevie Wonder? Great vid kid, and nice fish. Don't let the little stuff bug you, life is too short, listen to me talk. I went off on an old guy today because he was wearing Kroks, bad enough Louis had those abominations on his feet, he had black knee socks on with shorts on to boot. I have to get him a subscription of GQ. Krocs are worse than 70's Disco music.

People suck! See a guy waaay out on the lake in a toon they gotta figure "hey, that guy is not paddling and kicking all the way out there on just some whim, he's gotta be dialed in."  That and, because you are famous on the internet too, both are good reason to park on top of you.
